description:
Alec is a 22-year-old muscle guy who flew down from the northeastern part of the country.
He doesn't have a girlfriend and likes to spend his time hangin' with his friends.
When asked about his sexual preferences: "All girls, definitely all girls."
He told me he would like to be in a relationship but the girls in his home town are "not really that good looking."
The best part of this video is when he's laying on the bed, legs up in the air, showing off his hairy asshole. He is asked to touch his hole, which he does so reluctantly.
"What's it feel like to you?"
"It feels warm," he replies.
"Warm like what?"
"Um... apple pie!"
I bet it does.
title: Alec
